content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (position not specified)
- Boiler (position not specified)
- Offshore Pump (position not specified)

### Copper Plate Mine
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position not specified)
- Furnace (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to use any crafting or processing entities. Check inventory for necessary resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to entity status
- Regularly check the status of entities (e.g., furnaces) to ensure they have the necessary ingredients and fuel to operate effectively.
